## Distributions

## Model Fitting

- `lm()` - linear model
- `glm()` - generalized linear model

- `nls()` - nonlinear least squares


`base::summary()` give you info about the model you fitted.  Applied to data frames it summarizes each column.

hclust() - has print(), plot(), identify functions
